abstract: As he left the room at the Johnson County Republican Dinner here, Mr. Perry was asked by a reporter whether he agreed with the comments of Mr. Jeffress about the Mormon Church being a cult. "No," he replied.
snippet: As he left the room at the Johnson County Republican Dinner here, Mr. Perry was asked by a reporter whether he agreed with the comments of Mr. Jeffress about the Mormon Church being a cult. "No," he replied.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)

lead_paragraph: TIFFIN, Iowa - Gov. Rick Perry of Texas said Friday night that he does not believe the Mormon Church is a cult, but he declined to answer questions about a remark from a Texas pastor who criticized the religion of Mitt Romney and declared that he "is not a Christian."

headline.main: Perry Disagrees With Supporter's Comment on Mormon Church
